title: 109_hr3145
content: Mandatory IDEA Full Funding Compromise Act - Amends the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) to reauthorize part B programs of education of all children with disabilities. Authorizes appropriations in specified amounts for part B for FY2006-FY2012 and thereafter, according to a certain formula. Makes appropriations in specified amounts for part B for FY2006-FY2012 and thereafter.
